track.name: 40 Oz. To Freedom
comments: the answers always waiting at the liquor store 40 oz to freedom so i take that walk.....got the 40 oz tatto to prove it
If you live in Florida, you can only get 32 oz worth of freedom...    :(
A 40 oz. to freedom is the only chance I have to feel good even though I feel bad.
“hey bro, think you could loan me a buck or two?...im just, just totally broke man."
and youll be gone before tooo long!
A 40 oz. to freedom is the only chance I have to feel good even though I feel bad...
the answer is allways at the liquor store
I first heard this on Hoax 2 - Anarchy Across America in '95. Hooked ever since!
I'm a HUGE Sublime fan, but for some reason, the only part of this song I really like is the first 10 seconds before the lyrics kick in. That part is just so damn catchy
Who taught you those new tricks? Damn, I shouldn't start that talk..
life is one big question when you're staring at the clock
